cue import -o - -f --with-context -l '"\(path.Ext(filename)):\(index)" "\(data["@name"])"' ./import
cmp stdout expect-stdout
-- expect-stdout --
".jsonl:0": elem1: {
	kind:    "Service"
	"@name": "elem1"
}
".jsonl:1": elem2: {
	kind:    "Deployment"
	"@name": "elem2"
}
".jsonl:2": elem3: {
	kind:    "Service"
	"@name": "elem3"
}
-- import/services.jsonl --
{
    "kind": "Service",
    "@name": "elem1"
}
{
    "kind": "Deployment",
    "@name": "elem2"
}
{
    "kind": "Service",
    "@name": "elem3"
}
-- cue.mod --
